Apple Scab Leaf.Cause: Fungal infection caused by Venturia inaequalis.

Apple rust leaf.Cause: Caused by Gymnosporangium juniperi-virginianae, spreads from junipers.

Bell pepper leaf spot.Cause: Caused by Xanthomonas campestris bacteria, leading to dark lesions.

Corn Gray leaf spot.Cause: Caused by Cercospora zeae-maydis, thrives in humid conditions.

Corn leaf blight.Cause: Caused by Bipolaris maydis or Exserohilum turcicum fungi, affecting yield.

Corn rust leaf.Cause: Caused by Puccinia sorghi, spreads through wind-borne spores.

Potato leaf early blight.Cause: Caused by Alternaria solani, worsened by wet conditions.

Potato leaf late blight.Cause: Caused by Phytophthora infestans, spreads rapidly in humid weather.

Squash Powdery mildew leaf.Cause: Caused by Podosphaera xanthii, forms white powdery spots.

Tomato Early blight leaf.Cause: Caused by Alternaria solani, leads to leaf necrosis.

Tomato Septoria leaf spot.Cause: Caused by Septoria lycopersici, spreads through water droplets.

Tomato leaf bacterial spot.Cause: Caused by Xanthomonas spp., leads to black lesions on leaves.

Tomato leaf late blight.Cause: Caused by Phytophthora infestans, spreads rapidly in moist conditions.

Tomato leaf mosaic virus.Cause: Caused by Tobacco mosaic virus (TMV), leads to mottled leaves.

Tomato leaf yellow virus.Cause: Caused by Tomato yellow leaf curl virus (TYLCV), transmitted by whiteflies.

Tomato mold leaf.Cause: Caused by Cladosporium fulvum, thrives in high humidity.

grape leaf black rot.Cause: Caused by Guignardia bidwellii, affects grapevine yield.
